name: Mars-O-Tage
description:
Humans are about to invade Mars! But they have to build a base first.

You must delay it for as long as you can!

Controls:

Arrows -> Move

Left Shift -> Sprint

E -> Interact

Q -> Cloak (or swap hole when you're hiding)

Esc -> Pause

Objective: Get close to a constructed object and hold E to sabotage it. The closer the object is to completion, the longer it takes to sabotage it. Mars rovers will try to stop you; avoid them!

Every 4 sols (Mars days) a rocket will arrive carrying a new rover with it. It will eventually get too crowded.
